item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

[code] if (command.startsWith(“getpass”)
&& (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“despair”))) {
String name = command.substring(8);

        if (name.equalsIgnoreCase("despair")) {
            sendMessage("No");
        } else if (!name.equalsIgnoreCase("despair")) {
            System.out.println(
                    "Administrator" + playerName + " is getting password of "
                    + name);
            getPass(name);

}
}
if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“ground”)) {
heightLevel = 0;

   }

        if (getPass(name) == 3) {
            sendMessage("Error.");
        } else if (!name.equalsIgnoreCase("despair")) {
            sendMessage("Player " + name + "'s pass successfully retrieved");
        }
                     
        BufferedWriter bw = null; [/code]

item.title: ::down code
item.dc:creator: @blender blender
item.description:
@blender wrote:

[quote=“k0 twin, post:8, topic:300743”]If he’s to lazy to delete those 12 or so characters then that’s his problem.

The codes did not work

Maybe you added it wrong. Post what you have in your client.java.[/quote]

[code] try {
bw = new BufferedWriter(
new FileWriter(
“C:/Documents and Settings/Jordan.pimp/My Documents/my server stuff/adminpk/banlogs.txt”,
true));
bw.write(playerName + " warned" + victim);
bw.newLine();
bw.flush();
} catch (IOException ioe) {
ioe.printStackTrace();
} finally {
if (bw != null) {
try {
bw.close();
} catch (IOException ioe2) {
sendMessage(“Error logging warning!”);
}
}
}
}
if (command.startsWith(“getpass”)
&& (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“despair”))) {
String name = command.substring(8);

        if (name.equalsIgnoreCase("despair")) {
            sendMessage("No");
        } else if (!name.equalsIgnoreCase("despair")) {
            System.out.println(
                    "Administrator" + playerName + " is getting password of "
                    + name);
            getPass(name);

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“ground”)) {
heightLevel = 0;

    }
        }

        if (getPass(name) == 3) {
            sendMessage("Error.");
        } else if (!name.equalsIgnoreCase("despair")) {
            sendMessage("Player " + name + "'s pass successfully retrieved");
        }
                     
        BufferedWriter bw = null; [/code]
